means: 特定区域的，特定地区的

word_mean: 区的，部位的：属于、限于或影响某一(些)区域的

sentence.Network_en: Now he plans to rev up publicity with a regional media campaign.
sentence.Network_cn: 现在他准备通过开展地区性的媒体活动加大宣传力度。

sentence.Network_en: The resort is surrounded by extensive national and regional parklands.
sentence.Network_cn: 那个度假胜地被广阔的国家和地区绿地所环绕。

sentence.Network_en: Under pressure from the public, many regional governments cleaned up their beaches.
sentence.Network_cn: 迫于公众压力，许多地区政府对各自海滩进行了清理。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 石油词汇英语翻译(QR)--石油百科 ... regional zonal sequence 区域分带层序 regional 区域的 regionalized variable 区域化变量.
on shared regional characteristics of the han nationality ., 汉民族共同地域特征论.
The iron ore price will be regional differences in it ?, 铁矿石的价格会有地域性的差异吗?
医学英语教程_百度文库 ... al 表示有…的属性 regional 局部的 natural 自然的.

list.abs: 区域经济学将区域( Region) 视为一个经济空间概念,是具有“经济上密切的相关性、 协调运转的整体性、相互交叉的渗透性”的内部联 …
我国对外签订避免双重征税协定一览表 ... 丹麦 DENMARK 地区 Region 香港特别行政区 HKSAR.

entry.def: Regional is used to describe things which relate to a particular area of a country or of the world.

example.tran: 安达卢西亚自治区政府

means.word_mean: 2. related or limited to a particular region;

auth_sentence.content: Golf is a major contributor to the regional economy.
auth_sentence.res_content: Golf is a major contributor to the regional economy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Golf is a major contributor to the regional economy.

auth_sentence.content: Regional leaders say the plan will hurt the poor.
auth_sentence.res_content: Regional leaders say the plan will hurt the poor.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Regional leaders say the plan will hurt the poor.

auth_sentence.content: He said the sub-regional body sharply condemns the violence.
auth_sentence.res_content: He said the sub-regional body sharply condemns the violence.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He said the sub-regional body sharply condemns the violence.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表名词"人,物,状态"; 2. 地方; 3. 表形容词,"……的"

stems_affixes.word_buile: mur墙壁+al人,物,状态→adj.墙壁的 n.壁画
riv=river+al人,物,状态→竞争
affection爱;感情+al……的→adj.情感上的,爱情的
agriculture农业+al……的→adj.农业的,农艺的
clinic临床+al……的→adj.临床的,病房用的
con共同+gen出生+it+al……的→与生俱来
continent大陆+al……的→adj.大陆的,大陆性的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 连续的,频繁的,持续不断的
stems_affixes.word_buile: continue连续+al……的→adj.连续的,频繁的,持续不断的
crime罪行+in+al……的→criminal犯罪的,刑事的

cynic愤世嫉俗者+al……的→adj.愤世嫉俗的

economic经济的+al……的→adj.节约的,经济的
education教育+al……的→adj.教育的;有教育意义的
emotion情绪+al……的→adj.情绪的,情感的
exception例外+al……的→adj.例外的,异常的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 虚构的,小说式的,编造的

horizon地平线+tal=al……的→adj.地平线的,水平的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 附带的,伴随的,非主要的,偶然的,容易发生的
stems_affixes.word_buile: incident偶然事件+al……的→附带的,偶然的

stems_affixes.word_buile: margin页边,边缘+al……的→adj.记在页边的,边缘的,边际的

stems_affixes.word_buile: nature自然界,大自然;天性+al……的→adj.自然的,自然界的,关于自然界的,天生的

stems_affixes.word_buile: occasion发生+al……的→adj.偶然的,非经常的,特殊场合的,临时的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 个人的,私人的;亲自的;身体的,人身的

Sentence.sentence: Realizing that this particular audience would find his regional accent unattractive, Larry planned to speak with an accent that would be more acceptable to his audience.
By establishing more regional technology transfer offices.
